description:
Wind chill, negative temperatures, and icy sections - these boots stand up to them all. Lofty insulation and a waterproof membrane provide a pleasant winter experience for your feet, keeping your toes warm and dry during winter's worst. The Arctic Grip sole stands secure on slippery ice or compact snow, without the need for metal spikes or inserts. Plus, many of the components are made with recycled content and the insulation is even biodegradable, helping reduce your environmental impact and preserve our world.

  • Oiled Nubuck leather and ripstop textile upper are durable and water-resistant
  • B-Dry waterproof-membrane keeps water and snow from seeping in
  • 200g PrimaLoft Bio insulation keeps feet warm and is biodegradable at the end of its life
  • Spandex snow gaiter keeps snow on the outside where it belongs
  • ACT+™ dual-density EVA midsole supports and cushions underfoot
  • Vibram Arctic Grip rubber grips slippery snow and ice
name: Oboz Bangtail Mid Insulated B-Dry Winter Boots - Men's
